events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and our team will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering roles based on your background and experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering positions has been assigned and will contact you soon.
We completed an initial screening call and were impressed with your technical knowledge and communication skills.
Thank you for your prompt reply confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10 AM UTC. Please prepare accordingly.
The technical interview went very well; your problem-solving skills and coding proficiency were evident.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 15th at 3 PM UTC with our HR manager.
Your HR interview concluded positively; the team appreciated your cultural fit and career aspirations.
We are excited to extend you an offer for the Software Engineer position with competitive compensation and benefits.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
Congratulations! You have accepted the offer, and we are thrilled to have you onboard as part of our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started with initial orientation sessions and setup for your development environment.
The hiring process is now closed successfully. Welcome once again to our engineering department!
